mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student ( id, password, name, phone, mail, gender, zip_code, address, address_detail1, address_detail2, school_name, grade, class_no, eigen_no, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{mail}, #{gender}, #{zip_code}, #{address}, #{address_detail1}, #{address_detail2}, #{school_name}, #{grade}, #{class_no}, #{eigen_no}, now(), now())

INSERT INTO leave_pass( school_no, dormitory, student_no, student_id, student_name, student_grade, content, admin_approval, start_date, end_date, reg_date, mod_date ) VALUES ( #{school_no}, #{dormitory}, #{student_no}, #{student_id}, #{student_name}, #{student_grade}, #{content}, #{admin_approval}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, now(), now() )
